# Mandolyn White Portfolio Project

This is a Next.js project for creating a mobile-first link tree style portfolio website for Mandolyn White, a mural artist.

## Project Requirements
- Single page portfolio with mobile-first design
- Sections: headshot, name, title, bio, social links, gallery
- Next.js framework
- Git repository with GitHub integration

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and functional components
- Implement responsive design with CSS modules or Tailwind CSS
- Follow Next.js best practices for performance
- Ensure accessibility standards are met
